title: Smokey kafta kebab
ingredients: ['500g chicken mince', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/4 teaspoon ground paprika', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch red chilli powder', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '4 to 5 garlic cloves', '1 small onion', '2 whole green chilies (or to taste)', '1 handful fresh coriander leaves', '4 to 5 large pieces of ordinary BBQ coals for smoking']
